about_the_game:
Remember your first kiss? Maybe the first girl you asked out? Or the crush you had in high school? Those were the times when love felt genuine...

"Ladies I'm Ready" is a captivating love story presented in a real-life, full-motion interactive video format. You will not only meet but also fall in love with two beauties with completely different personalities and styles. Would you ignore your feelings and focus on school? Or would you choose love over grades? In the end, you can't have it all, but rest assured, the decision you make comes from your heart.

Jess - The Cute Art Girl

"Will you skip the lecture with me?"

Brittany - The Hot Tennis Girl

"We could make a great coup..."

Key Features

· Fully immersive first-person perspective

"Ladies I'm Ready" is presented entirely in a first-person perspective, allowing players to become fully immersed in scene interactions. Experience an authentic story and a heartfelt romance with the girl of your choice.

· Multiple story branches, endings, and hidden storylines

The interactive game is designed with dozens of story branches, five unique endings, and multiple hidden storylines. Additionally, there's an in-game achievement system alongside Steam achievements for you to track your progress. In the game, make the choice that resonates with your heart, rather than the "correct" choice, because everyone expresses love differently.

· Acted by real actors, filmed in real-life locations

Unlike typical visual novels, this time it's REAL! Designed for both visual novel enthusiasts and newcomers, because this time, you don't need to read pages of text to enjoy the stories. Instead, you can enjoy it like a movie, with the added thrill of deciding how it unfolds.

· Two girls with distinct personalities

Will it be the outgoing, extroverted girl waiting for someone to accept her love? Or is it the cool but secretly shy girl who finally has the courage to express her feelings? Which one will you pick?

About Us

We are Midou Studio, a small studio with big dreams. Our goal is to introduce a new form of media to the world. We love films, we love video games, so why not combine the two?

Written at the end

This form of media is not completely new, in fact, there are plenty of FMV (Full-Motion Video) games on the market. But why haven't they made a splash? We believe that to introduce something new, people need to feel connected to it. Sure, detective storylines are exciting, but not everyone is into murder mysteries.

LOVE, on the other hand, is universal. That's why we started with something simple yet timeless - college romance. When love was just love. Nothing more, nothing less.

short_description: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.
